title: Free Agent DB/LB Rankings, Tom Brady/Ryan Tannehill talk, Gronk's new deal!? (Football 3/12)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Bryant McFadden as Free Agency Preview Week continues. The guys first discuss what free agency is like from a player's perspective (1:00), as BMac describes the experience he went through in 2009. Then, we focus on Tom Brady's reported free agent demands (6:50) and the Titans focus on retaining Ryan Tannehill (11:40). Where is Rob Gronkowski headed now (18:00)? More on how COVID-19 could affect upcoming NFL events. There are some rule proposals for the 2020 season, the guys vote on what's worth passing (23:45). Next, Will and Bryant rank the top defensive backs (34:00) and linebackers in this year's free agency class and assess their best landing spots.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @BMac_SportsTalk
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
